title: Manchester United vs Liverpool player ratings: Who soared and who staggered at Old Trafford
text:
Manchester United

David De Gea

Surprisingly underworked and had no chance with the goal. Did what he had to do with minimum of fuss. 6

Aaron Wan-Bissaka

Plenty of energy and strong running from the wing-back position although his final ball often left a lot to be desired. Tussled well against Mané on occasion. 6

Victor Lindelof

Outmuscled early on a couple of occasions by Origi but got his own back with the challenge that led to the opening goal. Escaped some poor defending when Mané’s “equaliser” was ruled out. 5
